ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get Sign In Sign Out Activity Report
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get Sign In Sign Out Activity Report
ActivityMetadata.Description: Retrieve a list of sign in / sign out activity logs [report](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363213-Getting-Started-with-Reports) of users under a Zoom account. **Prerequisites** * Pro or higher plan. **Scopes:** `report:read:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Get Sign In / Sign Out Activity Report

Retrieve a list of sign in / sign out activity logs [report](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363213-Getting-Started-with-Reports) of users under a Zoom account. **Prerequisites** * Pro or higher plan. **Scopes:** `report:read:admin`

Method: Get

OperationID: reportSignInSignOutActivities

EndPoint:

/report/activities
